posts.post_content:
Considering letting one or both of these go, not a fan of make-an-offer listings however there doesn't seem to be a formula to price these backs. :D  

I will entertain all offers, including trade & cash.  [URL="atx840@gmail.com"]atx840@gmail.com[/URL]

Thanks for looking.

[IMG]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3834/11405611716_c82da4e720_c.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8404/8832377980_43dbaa9f44_c.jpg[/IMG]

Chris,

Great cards and quite rare as well.  Best of luck w/ the sale or trade.
say it aint so...solly is on the chopping block????  I'd offer you 10 times what I paid for it in the early 90's...but I'm guessing that won't cut it!!

Pete, I do need a new leather recliner.:D  Really enjoy the Drum, will need to be a strong number to let it go.

Both cards have multiple offers, some very close to where I think they are at!

Thanks for looking guys.
Nice looking cards Chris. Too bad I don't have any duplicate Hal Chase cards to trade.
